70990.「……<cs_pchero>さま。デモンシーサーを\n 倒してくださったようです: I see that you've defeated Demon Shisa.

70992.「この盾の紋章は ラッカラン島の島主\n ゴーレック氏に仕える 兵士である証……:
The emblem on this shield...it's one of a
soldier of Chief Golek on Luckland Island...
It's made the same as the shield I had...

70994.<center>……かつて 私は ラッカランの\nゴーレック氏に仕える 女兵士で:
...I was once a soldier in service of Golek
in Luckland.

70995.<center>その頃 私は 同僚である\nランディという青年と 婚約を交わした:
Back then, I had just gotten engaged to a young man and my colleague, Randy. We both looked forward to spending our lives
together.

70996.<center>ですが 任務で モリナラ大森林を訪れた際\n私たちは あのデモン:
But when we came to Molinara Forest on a
mission, we were attacked by that Demon
Shisa.

70997.「ランディ……ランディ……。\n お願い 目を開けてちょうだい！\n ずっと一緒:
Randy... Please, Randy... you have to wake up!
We promised that we'd always be together...!

70999.「あなた ひとりを 死なせたりしないわ。\n この世で 結ばれないのなら\n せ:
I'm not going to let you die alone. If I can't
be with you here, then I'll at least be
together with you there...

71002.「あ あなたは……？\n どうして 子供が こんな所に……？:
What are you...
How did a child get in such a dangerous
place...?

71004.「ボク……帰らなくちゃいけなくて……。\n だけど 追いだされちゃったから\n:
I had to go home but I couldn't go home by
myself because they kicked me out.

71006.「おねえちゃん ボクといっしょに\n 帰ってくれないかな。おねえちゃんと\n い:
Young lady, will you come home with me? I'm
sure I can go home with you.

71007.「そしたら ボク…… おねえちゃんの頼み\n どんなことでも きいてあげるから！: And I'll do whatever you ask, young lady!

71010.「もう呼びかけても 返事をしないの。\n 息も 止まってしまった……。\n ラン:
He doesn't answer my calls anymore. He's
stopped breathing... and Randy's not gonna
make it...

71011.「おねえちゃんの 願いは\n その人を 助けることなんだね？\n じゃあ……すこ:
So young lady, your wish is to help that
person, right? Then...wait a bit.

71014.「これで ボクといっしょに帰ってくれるよね？: Now you'll come home with me, right?

71017.「……すべてを思いだしました。\n 何が 私を 世告げの姫として\n 動かしてい:
I remembered everything. What was driving me
to become the Oracle Princess.

71018.「……この盾は 私の婚約者 ランディの物。\n おそらく 魔物に襲われた時に\n:
...This shield belonged to my fiancee, Randy.
He probably dropped it when he was attacked by
a monster.

71019.「ランディが その後 どうしているのか……。\n 気がかりですが 私には まだ\:
I do wonder how Randy is doing since then, but
I still have my duties to fulfill as Oracle
Princess.

71211.「この戦いさえ 終わらせることができれば\n 私は 元の女兵士に戻れるでしょう。:
If only I could finish this battle, I would be
a woman soldier again. And then I can be with
Randy again...

71212.「これは 決戦をひかえた <cs_pchero>さまへの\n はなむけであり 私:
This is a gift to <cs_pchero> for the
upcoming decisive battle, as well as a thank
you from me. Please accept it.

71213.「……そろそろ メルエが\n <cs_pchero>さまの 訪れを\n 待ってい:
...I'm sure Merue will be waiting for
<cs_pchero> to visit soon.

71214.「彼女もまた 過去の記憶を失ったせいで\n 心に 迷いを抱えているのかもしれませ:
She may also be carrying some confusion in her
mind due to the loss of her past memories.
Please help us.
